renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor,in vec2 fragCoord){vec2 p=fragCoord/iResolution.xy;float x=(p.x-0.5)*16.0;float y=(p.y-0.5)*9.0;float mx=5.0*(iMouse.x)/float(iResolution.x);float my=5.0*iMouse.y/float(iResolution.y);float x1=2.0;float y1=3.0;for (int i=1;i<=4;i++){x1=sin(y*(x+mx)+my+iTime);y1=sin(x*(y+my)+mx+iTime);x=x1;y=y1;}float c=sin((x+y+iTime)*3.0);fragColor=vec4(c,sin(c+iTime),sin(c+iTime*2.0),1.0);}
renderpass.name: Image
